item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

Join me for some salsa lessons at Club Caribe. It looks like it will be the last lessons of the series for the July Edtion.

Here are some more details.

Date: July 29, 2010
Start Time: 8pm - Surprise (TBD) lesson
9pm - Salsa lesson
10pm - 1am: Salsa/Bachata/Merengue mix by GUEST DJ Lizito

Cover Charge: $10
Location: 777 Memorial Drive, Cambridge, MA

*****BRING A GUEST FOR FREE! (2-for-1 before 9:30pm)

You must RSVP through the web (Click Here To RSVP)

THE FINE PRINT: This discount gives you half off the cover charge (normally $10 ea) for two people, and optionally half off the 9pm BEGINNER Salsa lesson (normally $5 ea). You MUST RSVP online to receive the discount. When you do so, our website will email you a coupon for you and your guest.

You must arrive before 9:30pm.


Always @ Club Caribe:
FREE PARKING (VALET is FREE)
Free eats
All ages
Large dance floor
Fully stocked bar (21+ to drink of course)

Dress: no sports attire, please.

Let me know if you have an questions!!

See you there!!!


-Angel S.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a fedora hat...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Lessons at Club Caribe!!! End of the July Edition !!
